summary: The diff implements most of the strict role-based data control and government workflow separation requirements. Key implementations include: GovernmentDataPanel with 15 fields and auto-calculated 7-day averages, LastGovernmentReport component with 9 read-only fields, EmailAlertService with placeholder credentials, AlertHistory with 14 columns, InterventionPriority with vulnerability weight formula, RiskPredictionPanel role-based simplification, and DashboardPage role-based rendering. However, some requirements are partially implemented or unverifiable due to diff truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all environmental input forms and risk calculation controls from Common Citizen view in DashboardPage.tsx
missing_requirements.reason: While DashboardPage.tsx shows role-based rendering logic, the diff is truncated and does not show complete Common Citizen view implementation to verify all input forms are removed

missing_requirements.requirement: Update DashboardPage.tsx to render only specified components for Common Citizen view
missing_requirements.reason: DashboardPage.tsx is truncated, preventing full verification that Common Citizen view renders exactly: LastGovernmentReport, RiskGauge, DiseaseClassification, SafetyAdvisory, PreventiveRecommendations, WardHeatmap, AlertHistory, and no other sections

missing_requirements.requirement: Render GovernmentDataPanel only in Government view, positioned at top of dashboard
missing_requirements.reason: DashboardPage.tsx is truncated and does not show the complete Government view implementation or positioning of GovernmentDataPanel at the top

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify and maintain consistent visual styling across all dashboard components with specified colors and spacing
missing_requirements.reason: While some components show proper styling, diff does not include all dashboard components to fully verify consistent 24px padding, color thresholds, and styling across entire application
